page.title: 02PUPILS AND TEACHERS
page.content: The followig schools and people were involved in the research and preparation of the data for the Domesday Project. WROTHAM SCHOOL, an 11-16 High School with 527 pupils. Form 1R, a first year class of 28 pupils aged between 11-12 and the Sixth Form aged between 16-17 were assisted by Mr.Brian Scragg, Mr,Philip Noakes Mr.John Allen and Mrs.Anne Lawley. BOROUGH GREEN COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL was represented by third year junior pupils assisted by their teacher Mrs. Pam Hatcher. St.MARY'S PLATT PRIMARY SCHOOL was represented by fourth year pupils and assisted by their teachers Mr.P.Relph and Mr.Hoskins.
